backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining access-controlled user profiles, radio stream checks, request storage, and push subscription management using http outcalls.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of frontend file summaries describing component behavior, hooks, styles, and PWA functionality.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_DEBUG.md: Notes on a failed TypeScript build caused by browser-incompatible Node.js typings in App.tsx.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML document configuring meta tags, PWA settings, Google Cast SDK, and fallback recovery UI.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, theme colors, icons, categories, and shortcuts.
frontend/public/service-worker.js: Service worker handling asset caching, cache versioning, cleanup, and push notifications.
frontend/README-verify.md: Guide explaining how to run the frontend verification script before deployment.
frontend/scripts/verify-frontend.mjs: Node-based script checking TypeScript config, forbidden NodeJS.Timeout usage, background asset paths, and service worker asset references.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing navigation, audio playback, service worker recovery, and global query configuration.
frontend/src/components/CastControl.tsx: UI control for starting and stopping Chromecast playback with status indicators and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: PWA installation prompt handling platform detection, install guides, and the beforeinstallprompt workflow.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Renders a bottom tab bar for navigating between home, browse, and settings views.
frontend/src/components/player/MiniPlaye: A compact audio player showing track info, album art, and play/pause controls with click-to-open behavior.
frontend/src/components/player/TrackTitl: Creates an animated marquee for long track titles with reduced-motion support and interactive pause behavior.
frontend/src/components/player/VolumeSli: Controls and syncs audio element volume using a slider component.
frontend/src/components/PushNotification: Panel for enabling and displaying status of push notifications with subscription handling and errors.
frontend/src/components/RequestForm.tsx: Dialog form for submitting song or shoutout requests using a mutation with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ServiceWorkerRec: Banner prompting users to refresh or reset the app when updates are available or load errors occur.
frontend/src/components/ShareButton.tsx: Share button using Web Share API with fallback modal and clipboard copy support.
frontend/src/components/shows/ShowCard.t: Displays show details including image, description, genres, and schedule in a clickable card.
frontend/src/components/status/LiveBadge: Shows a red animated LIVE badge with an icon for live status indication.
frontend/src/components/status/OnAirIndi: A small animated accent-colored dot indicating live or active status.
frontend/src/components/TrackNotificatio: Displays a styled notification for tracks with icons and colors based on type, supporting dismiss actions.
frontend/src/data/mockShows.ts: Defines the Show interface and provides mock data for several radio shows.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlbumArtBackground: Empty placeholder hook with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppLifecyclePlayba: Handles resuming audio playback across visibility changes, focus events, and bfcache restores.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundImageDia: Hook that checks body background image after mount and logs a warning if missing.
frontend/src/hooks/useChromecast.tsx: Hook that initializes and manages Chromecast availability, connections, sessions, and errors for streaming.
frontend/src/hooks/useFavoriteStation.ts: Hook that stores and toggles a boolean favorite flag in localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth client, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarqueeMeasurement: Hook that measures overflow and computes marquee animation values with retries and dynamic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotifications.ts: Hook that determines notification type from now-playing data and manages browser notification permission and display logic.
frontend/src/hooks/usePushSubscription.t: Hook that manages Web Push subscription flow, permission handling, and backend registration via service worker.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching stream URLs, checking stream availability, retrieving now-playing data, and submitting user requests with fallback and validation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerRegis: Manages service worker registration, update handling, cache reset, and related state including readiness and update availability.
frontend/src/hooks/useSleepTimer.ts: Implements a sleep timer that counts down and pauses audio playback when time expires, with controls to start and cancel.
frontend/src/hooks/useWakeLock.ts: Requests and manages screen wake locks during active playback, handles release events, and re-requests on visibility changes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, color variables, and responsive background images for mobile and desktop layouts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app and wraps it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/screens/BrowseShowsScreen.t: Displays a filterable list of mock radio shows with genre and day filters and handles show selection.
frontend/src/screens/HomeLiveScreen.tsx: UI for the home live stream screen with play controls, now‑playing display, and favorite toggle, handling playback states and errors.
frontend/src/screens/NowPlayingScreen.ts: Displays detailed now‑playing view with album art, track info, play controls, volume, sharing, and sleep timer support.
frontend/src/screens/SettingsAboutScreen: Settings page with notification controls and a background image cache refresh action using service worker and cache APIs.
frontend/src/screens/ShowDetailScreen.ts: Show info page displaying show metadata, image, schedule, and options like adding the show to a calendar.
Startup diagnostics utility that collects early loading errors and shows a recovery overlay if critical issues are detected.
frontend/src/utils/analytics.ts: Google Analytics helper functions providing safe wrappers for event tracking including play, pause, and cast events.
frontend/src/utils/ics.ts: Generates an ICS calendar file for a show by computing the next occurrence and creating a downloadable .ics Blob.
frontend/src/utils/normalizeArtworkUrl.t: Normalizes raw artwork URLs to valid HTTPS absolute URLs, handling relative, protocol‑relative, and invalid inputs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters, supporting both query strings and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes, colors, screens, animations, and enabling plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining current features, issues, image requirements, and new feature requests for the build.
